CorpUserEditableInfo.description: Linkedin corp user information that can be edited from UI

aboutMe.description: About me section of the user

teams.description: Teams that the user belongs to e.g. Metadata

skills.description: Skills that the user possesses e.g. Machine Learning

pictureLink.description: A URL which points to a picture which user wants to set as a profile photo

platforms.description: The platforms that the user commonly works with

persona.description: The user's persona type, based on their role

phone.description: Phone number to contact the user

email.description: Email address to contact the user

informationSources.description:
Information sources that have been used to populate this CorpUserEditableInfo.
These include platform resources, such as Slack members or Looker users.
They can also refer to other semantic urns in the future.
